title: Dino--Draws' Bullshittery Emporium
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:flopstyle-dark]]
[[module css]]
:root {
  --accentColor: #6535ff;
  --accentColorLite: #00bff3;
  --lgurl: url(https://i.imgur.com/yBYVr7r.png);

  /* -- TITLES -- */
     --header-title: "DINO--DRAWS'";
     --header-subtitle: "BULLSHITTERY EMPORIUM";
     --subtitleColor: hsl(101, 53, 255)
}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
 #page-content a {
   --accentColor: #00bff3;
   --accentColorLite: #80e3ff;
}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
.art-container {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    align-content: center;
    justify-content: space-around;
    align-self: flex-end
    gap: 1rem 1rem;
}
.art-container .art {
    flex: 0 1 200px;
    text-align: center;
    padding-bottom: 1rem;
    padding-left: 1rem;
    padding-right: 1rem;
}

.art-container .art .image-container {
    padding: 0;
    min-height: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
}

div.blockquote.classic.curved.hovered {
z-index: 2;
transition: transform .16s;
}

div.blockquote.classic.curved.hovered:is(:hover,:focus-within) {
transform: scale(1.2);
z-index: 3;
filter: drop-shadow(0px 1px 10px #6535ff);
}

.scptitle {
font-weight: 700;
font-size: 150%;
}

[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
 --borderColor: (6535ff);
 --bgBadgeColor: (000000);
}
[[/module]]

[[module Rate]]

[[=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module Listpages created_by="Dino--Draws" order="created_at desc" limit="1" separate="no" wrapper="yes" category="_default art component theme adult"]]
**Check My Latest:** %%title_linked%%, rated +%%rating%%!
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[image DrawsGIF.gif]]
[[/=]]

++ [[span style="font-weight: bold; color: #00bff3;"]] It appears you have become trapped in my gay little labyrinth [[/span]]

[[div class="grid-item"]]
[[include component:image-block name= draws1.png |caption= Dr. Draws, allegedly. |width=400px|align= right]]
[[/div]]

Howdy hey!

I'm [[*user Dino‚Äê‚ÄêDraws]][[footnote]] I use fi/fir pronouns![[/footnote]], but you can just call me Dino!

A long series of complicated dominos including an SCP TTRPG, a rabbit hole or two, and an art event led to me joining the site back in late 2022, and now you'll have to beat me out with a mop if you ever want me to leave lmao.

I write, I draw, I'm a just a lil guy. My evil agenda on this website is to teach people about geology in roundabout ways, draw assorted beasts into photographs, and be unabashedly myself.

Buckle up, chuckle fucks.


+ [[span style="font-weight: bold; color: #00bff3;"]] SCPs [[/span]]

[[tab Testimonials]]
[[<]]
**I have friends, I swear! Look at what they had to say:**

‚Äúrest in peace dino, eaten by nico at least twelve times üòî‚Äù -[[*user Lemonsense]], who needs to stop telling people I‚Äôm dead

"If I had a nickel for every time I dragged Dino headfirst into a fandom space so hard that the hyperfixation lasted for years, I‚Äôd have two nickels! Which isn‚Äôt a lot but it‚Äôs weird it happened twice." -[[*user Rosyfox2002]], who's ttrpg is the reason I'm HERE

"Every time I encounter and obstacle in my path I have to rotate thru the next highest demension of space time andit basically scares the fuck out of me and shatters my psyche but yah " -[[*user TroutMaskReplica]], being a mood tbh

‚Äú[CC VIOLATION REDACTED]" -[[*user Damian Thorne]], about communism

[[/tab]]
[[tab Personnel File]]
[[<]]
[[div class="grid-item"]]
[[include component:image-block name= https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/amnesia-was-fir-name/draws |caption= ID Photo |width=300px|align= right]]
[[/div]]

**Name:** Dino ‚Äê‚Äê Draws [[footnote]]Please refrain from stating fir full name twice in sequence, to avoid a --STRIKETHROUGH-- event.[[/footnote]]

**Occupation:** Geologist, paleontological technician

**Clearance Level:** 3

**Born:** Unknown, claims to be "young, for a dragon"

**Assigned Site:** Site-898, frequently travels where needed for composition and structural analysis

**Nationality/Citizenship:** Unknown, hails from the Wanderer's Library, has American citizenship somehow

**Summary:** A walking antique shop with what some call a "retirement home lexicon", fi's a passionate and excitable member of both the Department of Geology and Department of Paleontology. Fir clearance has raised over the years due to projects fi engaged with by virtue of fir profession as a geologist. Sometimes dabbles in onomatology and engineering [via tinkering with odd things fi finds].

Physically disabled and definitely neurodivergent to some degree, fi paces like fir life depends on it and always loves to talk about fir work and ideas. Fir office in Site-898is full of various rocks and fossils fi's picked up on travels. Some are probably anomalous. Don't worry about it.

**Pronouns?:** Fi/fir, fi calls them fir ‚Äúartisan pronouns‚Äù

**Favorite Food?:** A very specific chili recipe that involves mexican hot chocolate

**Favorite Colors?:** Purple, red, orange

**What's fir taste in music?:** 80's dad rock, folk music, country, jazz, and breakcore on occasion. Big ol' Lord Huron 'n Florence and the Machine lover

**Favorite animals?:** Bitterns and komodo dragons

**Favorite dinosaurs?**: Spinosaurus, microraptor, pyroraptor, styracosaurus, quetzalcoatlus, ornithocheirus, and therizinosaurus

**Favorite rock?:** Gneiss, because fi loves to tell people to ‚Äúhave a gneiss day‚Äù

**What random assortment of people would fi shove into a locker if given the chance?:**
Dir. Vincent Bohart, Damien Nowak, wikidot user psychicprogrammer, Dr. Placeholder McDoctrate, Dir. Daniel Asheworth [would feel bad after], Dr. Daniil Sokolsky [just to see what would happen], Alex Thorley, Dr. William Wettle, Leon O'Sullivan [Attempted dick kicker], Dr. Atticus Rune, Dr. Francis Own, Dr. Jeremiah Cimmerian, Vincent Anderson, Ruiz Duchamp, the Critic [same locker]
